title: My DIY drip-line IRRIGATION setup EXPLAINED while welding a BROADFORK!

tasks.task: Setting up a drip line irrigation system for a garden
subtasks: Replacing a tine on a broad fork
Installing a filter for the irrigation system
Preparing and configuring drip lines for six beds
Welding a frame for the irrigation system
Planning the layout of the irrigation system in the garden
Preparing the garden beds for the drip line installation

tasks.task: 1. (MAINTASK) Setting up a drip line irrigation system for the garden
subtasks: - (SUBTASK) Replacing a tine on a broad fork (for garden preparation)

- (SUBTASK) Configuring drip lines for six beds (pipe setup)
- (SUBTASK) Welding a piece to fix the pipe issue (welding)
- (SUBTASK) Planning the layout of the irrigation system in the garden (garden preparation)
